title: My simple digital art of Gnar the Missing Link
body:
https://38.media.tumblr.com/a32b2a56d1d12e2d715b5e416df23746/tumblr_n9jmxpVTL91rljsaqo1_500.png

Gnar <3

—-

I suck at coming up and making a background xD; 
Even though he’s a top champion, he might be a great tanky support because of the amount of cc he has o3o and maybe a good jungler. I used to main top until I found out how OP Jax and Trydamere is ;A; I’m pretty bad at countering my counters
—-

Gnar (C) League of Legends 
Art made by me

replies.body: i see what you did there, nice. #punsofdamage.
If this guy isn't the cutest damn thing... its like MOVE OVER PORO'S!

I like to think Riot knew I was coming and made the skin for me before I got here. ;) 

It is one of the first skins I owned, since it was free. I chose the name cause it's simple, unrelated to my main acct (which i want separate so that no one expects too much of me when I'm on it) and something that reflected the music that I identified with growing up (100% PURE PUNK). 

I do have a friend IRL named Tristana and used to wish I had her name. She is a person though, not a yordle.

Riot OP, can read the future. (Please tell me which stocks to invest in...)

Tristana is an awesome name, though it is a bit alarming that your friend is *not a Yordle*, that would be pretty cool.

Cool one, looks really fluffy.

I'm finishing mine as well. Since there are so many people making Gnar art, I gotta contribute as well
I love this <3 I'm using this as my profile pic everywhere.
